title: Windermere
name: Windermere Lodge

reviews.content: Beautiful hotel at an unique location in the heart of Barcelona, near the placa Catalunya. Very authentic building with modern en comfortable room facilities. Here we will stay again when we visite Barcelona the next time.
reviews.author: Dr. Mary Schumm

description: Is a four star graded luxury pine lodge in Limefitt Park, Troutbeck.
